conclusion: Analyze the motion of the particle in the presence of both electric and magnetic fields.
Use principles of mechanics and electromagnetic fields to determine time taken for the particle to travel from O to P.
Identify initial and final conditions: particle injected from origin O with initial velocity v_0 along positive x-axis, travels to point P (3L, L).
Electric field is directed along the negative y-axis.
Electric field accelerates the particle in the positive x-direction.
Particle travels in a straight line, so distance OP = 4L.
Use formula for time taken for a particle moving in a straight line in a uniform electric field: t = d/v_0.
Time taken is independent of the initial velocity v_0.
